TopicTitle: Grasshopper flies 2440ft straight up and lands in the same spot. (SpaceX Video)

Articles.Content:
Not sure if anyone has already posted this but here you are

Video taken by a hexacopter
I just saw this yesterday. Simply amazing

PSHT MechJeb can already do that.

Kidding I do think it is amazing, I was trying to find video of the Falcon9 1.1 retro-burn and reentry but could not find anything, I think that would be much cooler to see.
Yep, saw that launch the other day. Still awesome ever time I watch one of a SpaceX flight.
